John Owen's Latine epigrams Englished by Tho. Harvey, Gent. ; dedicated by the author Mr. John Owen unto the Lady Mary Nevil, daughter of the Earl of Dorset. Epigrammata. English Owen, John, 1560?-1622. Harvey, Thomas.
[11], 208, [1] p. : port.
Printed by Robert White, for Nevil Simmons ..., and Thomas Sawbridge ..., London : 1677.
Added t.p.: The Latine epigrams of John Owen ..., rendred into English by Thomas Harvey. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. The epigrams of John Owen -- Epigrams of John Owen, an Oxonian and Cambrobritan : a single book -- Epigrams of John Owen, an Oxonian and Cambrobritan : three books ... -- Epigrams of John Owen, an Oxonian and Cambro-Britan : three books dedicated to three, each a Mecænas.
=======

[11], 208, [1] p. : port.
Printed by Robert White, for Nevil Simmons ..., and Thomas Sawbridge ..., London : 1677.
Added t.p.: The Latine epigrams of John Owen ..., rendred into English by Thomas Harvey. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. The epigrams of John Owen -- Epigrams of John Owen, an Oxonian and Cambrobritan : a single book -- Epigrams of John Owen, an Oxonian and Cambrobritan : three books ... -- Epigrams of John Owen, an Oxonian and Cambro-Britan : three books dedicated to three, each a Mecænas.
